Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the project brief and goals for the week.
Start creating low-fidelity wireframes for the main menu screen. Focus on layout and basic functionality.
Take a short break, browse design inspiration websites for UI ideas.
Continue working on the main menu wireframes, refining the layout and user flow.
Begin wireframing the HUD (Heads-Up Display) for the game, considering essential elements like health, ammo, and objectives.
Review initial wireframes for both main menu and HUD, make any necessary adjustments.
Prepare a presentation of the wireframes for tomorrow's team review.
